title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. Somehow, I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When I choose SWT.MULTI in the SWT example ControlExample under the Text tab, I hear a Windows 'ding' sound.
EB: When I choose SWT.MULTI in the SWT example ControlExample under the Text tab, I should not hear a Windows 'ding' sound.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the SWT example ControlExample.
2. Navigate to the Text tab.
3. Click on 'Styles: SWT.SINGLE'.
4. Click on 'Styles: SWT.MULTI' again.
